author: Karl Kovačević
comment: Will give 5 stars if you guys could actually make a troubleshooting guide, port 8484 is not working & I don't see anywhere to change ports! (Running Ubuntu)
title: Does not work..

author: Ammar Abbasi
comment: Everything works flawlessly, can't ask for more but a better UI would make this app even more awesome than it already is. Thanks.
title: Awesome app.

author: Neil Smith
comment: Excellent app. Remember to find the IP of the machine running Amarok, and set it in the app. Also remember to open port 8484 in any firewall on that machine.

author: Kyle Burton
comment: This app is great. I am impressed with how well it works and how quickly it responds.  Thank you mv^2 studio. You are incredible

author: Alfredo Rius
comment: The only thing that I'd add is the ability to play the Amarok library through the Android speaker.

author: Maggie Anne
comment: Works excellent, although a little light on features. It would be great to be able to see and edit paylists in the app.
title: Works great

author: Harald Clark
comment: All the basic commands you need in a simple and quick interface.
title: Simple and effective

author: Gary Lankford
comment: Most excellent! Thank you!
title: AmaroKontrol!

author: Philipp Klemm
comment: Works perfectly and looks good.

author: 聖司冬璃
comment: Well-designed UI.

author: Galaxy Irsiegler
comment: This is an extraordinary app. I'd be more than happy to pay for the ad free version. Wasn't able to find it though. Is it still available?
title: Ad free version?

author: Girish Kamath
comment: I love this app. I would love it even more if the music control persistent notification would appear on my Android Wear device so that I'd not have to pull out my phone to control Amarok.
title: Brilliant remote

author: Salvador Vega
comment: En un principio solo la interfaz era novedosa Ahora ya se puede editar la lista de reproducción, y ademas descargar canciones al celular desde la lista de reproducción de la PC Sin duda compro la versión de donacion
title: Exelente Actualizacion LA COMPRO

author: Fabricio Lima
comment: nice feature of download a song. miss volume control

reply.author: mv^2 studio
reply.content: You can use phone's vol +/- buttons ;)

title: missing volume control.

author: Bersam Karbasion
comment: Awesome Work

author: Plínio César Simões Fernandes
comment: Not perfect just because there is no way to remove a song from the playlist. Also more ability to manage the playlist like reordering songs would be cool. I hope you implement these features in the future. Buying the paid version for support. :)
title: Almost perfect

author: Lexis Buchanan
comment: What is wrong with this app I opened it and it does nothing what does this so pose to do ?

reply.author: mv^2 studio
reply.content: Hi. You have to set ip address of your pc in settings, and also install script in amarok music player on your pc. (Look in app's menu -> Help ;) )

title: Really bad

author: Jürgen Helmers
comment: Nice feature set. Browsing my library works just fine but I cannot choose a song from the collection. Whatever I do tapping holding does not select the song for playing.

reply.author: mv^2 studio
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Taping song in library should add song to current playlist. If it doesn't work that way, can you please report it as a bug? (In app menu -> report bug) Just write same text as in your review and I will contact you, so I can find out where's the problem.

title: good... ... but

author: Jozef Orenič
comment: Pouzivam to kazdy den, velmi prehladne zoradenie skladieb a kolekcii
title: Cool

author: Jeffrey Cheeseman
comment: Installed the android app on my tablet, followed the help instructions for installing the script in Amarok, the script says installed in the Amarok add-on installer, but does not show up in the configure scripts screen and I cannot connect with the android app. I verified the ip address, configured the firewall, finally disabled the firewall altogether to rule it out, nothing works. I suspect faulty script. Amarok version 2.8.0 on KDE 4.14.18 Android version 5.1. Please fix.
title: Does not work
